title: (Gameplay) Jarvan IV skin shard
body: Javan IV dark forge skin shard and shop skin has the picture for Jarvan IV dragon slayer.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! The team's aware of the issue and are working on a fix. :)
Are you typing this out every time you see a bug report of a bug that you are already aware off, or do you have a copy pasta for that? :P
Typing it out, haha. For stuff for other teams, I don't have a crap ton of context, but I'd like to let people know we know about it. ^-^
